title: Greg Miller Banned from E3 2020 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.27.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/GAMES now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Boost is only available at http://Experian.com/KFGAMES

E3 has finally had enough of Greg's BS and banned him from E3 2020. Andrea and Greg try to figure out what happened.

Time Stamps - 
00:01:30 - Housekeeping
It’s Thursday, that means it’s Party Mode day!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Daniel Massey, Black Jack, Colton Yoder, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:03:35 - I’m banned from E3
00:22:16 - Sony, Microsoft, and Nintendo against US Tariffs, Rebekah Valentine GIB
00:27:25 - Stadia on Data Caps, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:32:57 - Cyberpunk Install Size, Vergil @ GamePressure.com
00:35:32 - Harry Potter Fest
00:38:15 - Astral Chain NOT a Trilogy, Janet Garcia @ IGN
00:38:36 -  THIRDLOVE
00:39:45 -  EXPERIAN
00:51:50 - Out today
00:54:10 - Game Critics Awards: Best of E3 2019
Reader mail   -
00:46:15 - Do you guys see yourself as a news aggregator? - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:51:05 - Squad Up:TwoHeadedGiant(Switch/Twitch) - SW-4670-0577-3122
00:52:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Tim
